website_summaries.verdict: Pore cleanser to clear up acne and blackheads.
pros: Designed to clear pores and stop breakouts by using natural charcoal
Gets deep into pores to reduce acne and prevent future breakouts
Peppermint Oil cools the skin and  jojoba beads scrub away dead skin

website_summaries.verdict: Thanks to a top name in skin care, it’s easy and inexpensive to try the power of charcoal to clean and exfoliate face and body.
pros: Bar tends to last a long time if kept dry after use
Peppermint leaves a nice tingly feeling afterward
Adults with ongoing acne issues have found relief when more expensive products have been ineffective
cons: Dries out skin, so better for users with an oil problem
Some consumers report breakouts after initial use, which eventually clear up

customer_reviews.title: JUST NO
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy it My skin was ok , i just wanted to make it look brighter. I used this cleanser for 3 weeks and my face was slowly covered with bumps that i have never had in my entire life my skin is totally disgusting now, with all this small bumps all over my face and itching. i stopped the cleanser 3 days ago and my skin hasnt improved. i am really unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy any other soap
customer_reviews.text: I love charcoal soap! I have a very oily nose and forehead, and this soap helps regulate that. It has an almost minty smell, and kinda makes my face tingle a little bit, which helps me feel super clean and fresh! The soap also lasts forever - I only use it on my face twice a day, but one bar will last me a year.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Richards

customer_reviews.title: Keratosis pilaris approved.
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately have a skin disorder called Keratosis pilaris! This is an awesome bar, I use it primarily on my tough spots (back of arms and top of my thighs) it smells good, I immediately felt a difference in my "bumps" right after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea how you cannot love it
customer_reviews.text: First, if you have sensitive skin, maybe don't buy something with exfoliants embedded. However, if you have pores the size of pot-holes, like I previously did, this stuff is great. My pores are so much smaller. I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: I love these bars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars! I use them for full body when feeling icky from the humidity, even though my kiddo says you shouldn't do that often. Very happy with them for face and body. They have cleared up some redness and breakouts on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Not really a "charcoal" soap. More of a peppermint soap.
customer_reviews.text: This bar soap is not really a charcoal soap. Charcoal is the last ingredient. Instead, it has a good peppermint smell, and appears to work fairly well to clean the skin. So, in short, the charcoal is a marketing gimmick only. That's too bad. I was hoping to try bar of soap that had a significant amount of charcoal and it to see how it affected my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite face wash in the shower. It lasts forever and doesn't cost much. I usually get it at Ulta, but due to Covid, I just ordered it online.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Sikora

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleansing
customer_reviews.text: My face had broken out really badly from another cleanser (different company) and I bought this hoping my face would clear up and it did! Within just a few days my skin has cleared up all but one or two spots. It does get soft on the bottom, so I would recommend a soap holder thing that allows drainage on the bottom, otherwise is a great bar. Also, be sure to moisturize after using, it isn't the most moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great soap for pimples
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin type. I constantly having breakout and pimples problem. I tried many products, but this soap is so far the best! My skin is much better now. The pimples are way less and smaller than before. I think it is the right soap for me. It has been a month since I started to use this soap. My acnes are almost gone. My skin looks nice. I used it once in the morning and once before the bed. It works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER J ROM

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap, One Bar Lasts a Long Time
customer_reviews.text: They clean wonderfully, you can feel that tingle (don’t get it in your eye because you’ll suffer) I Love them, they last forever... I have never had a bar of soap last so long. I don’t know how they can make money off this product because it lasts so long
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne
customer_reviews.text: Great soap for the price. I love charcoal soap and I got a great deal on these so I tried them out. I like the soap other than there are sometimes slightly bigger chunks that hurt if you’re applying the soap directly to your skin
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good product if your skin is oily
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for me; however, I am not sure that it will be for others as my skin at my older age has always been somewhat oily and this product had worked for me but as I said, not sure for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Woodee

customer_reviews.title: Make this part of your beauty regimen!
customer_reviews.text: I love the soap! I've used it for a few years now. I'm in my 50s but I like to use this about three times a week to get an extra deep cleansing to my skin. It's got a delicious mint scent, and leaves my face tingling and invigorated
customer_reviews.author: Purse Queen

customer_reviews.title: clean
customer_reviews.text: This charcoal bar really impressed me. It lasts a long time and doesn't make you feel sticky. I will continue to order this product. It really cleans my skin & face.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap not just for my face but my body as well! This is a great Value for the simple fact that store prices are the same, and I can't always find it in the store! By far my favorite body soap outside of using and actual badly scrub!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to help the acne on my face out instantly overnight, continued to help for the next 3 days or so. But then after that 3rd day I started breaking out again and it wasn't really helping with the new breakouts so I stopped using it after around 2 weeks. I don't think it's a bad soap but it just wasn't the solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Love the soap will get again
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and will buy again. Completely clean my body and removes dirt. Very gentle on the skin but tough on odor. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Fraka987

customer_reviews.title: Best facial cleanser I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have tried many products. I love every aspect of this bar. The scent is amazing and mild exfoliation leaves my face falling refreshed. After a couple of days my skin looks so much healthier and my pores are less visible.
customer_reviews.author: WolfSong

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing cleansing bar
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial cleansing bar so much. I've tried it in the past, and wanted a refreshing clean so I repurchased. This bar is deep cleansing but does not over dry my skin. I have an oily/acne prone skin type, and this product is perfect for me. I also love the peppermint scent!
customer_reviews.author: Judy M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s unbeatable, but be careful not to use it everyday; dries out the skin. Switched it ti everyday 2-3 days.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase

There is a cooling element that stings if it gets in your eyes. The exfoliation beads don't really do anything.

customer_reviews.text: The soap renews your skin...it has really helped my complexion

customer_reviews.title: Great, helpful soap!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. I was nervous after reading reviews about it making people's skin break out (I'm guessing from allergic reactions) because I have sensitive skin, but it was completely fine. It is a bit drying, so I only use it once a day max and make sure to moisturize after (which you should so after washing your face anyway). But I can definitely feel it cleaning when I'm using it and see a difference in my skin. This definitely wasn't an overnight fix - clearing up your skin takes time. But I've been using this for about a month and overall this soap keeps my face (and chest and back) clear and smooth!

customer_reviews.title: This is a great solution for sensitive skin!

product_meta.title: Bioré Pore Penetrating Charcoal Bar, Daily Face Wash, Naturally Purifies Pores, Dermatologist Tested, Gently Exfoliates, Vegan Friendly, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free, 1 Count
product_meta.description:
Product Description:

Hold the pore-purifying power of charcoal in the palm of your hand with the Biore Pore Penetrating Charcoal Bar. Made to deeply cleanse and exfoliate both face and body, it’s infused with natural charcoal to draw out and trap impurities. Smooth jojoba beads gently exfoliate dead skin cells and debris, and natural peppermint oil leaves a tingly fresh, cool feeling all over. Start your day with a refreshing deep clean that leaves pores 2.5 times cleaner than with a basic soap. 

How to Use Biore Pore Penetrating Charcoal Bar:

Wet hands with warm water and work bar into a white lather. Massage lather gently across face and/or body, avoiding eye area. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry. Use up to twice daily. If dryness occurs, reduce usage. 

About Biore Skincare:

Biore Skincare targets the root of all skin problems—the evil clogged pore. So when it comes to dirt and oil we take a no nonsense approach to fight smarter, not harder. Our scrub, liquid, powder, strip, mask and bar cleansing products go straight to the source of those pesky pores for deeply clean, beautiful skin.
feature_bullets: PURIFY YOUR PORES - Infused with natural charcoal, this bar deep cleans your pores for balanced purification.
REFRESHED, SMOOTH SKIN - With exfoliating Jojoba beads & refreshing peppermint oil, this bar leaves skin clean, fresh & cool.
DRAW OUT IMPURITIES - Infused with natural charcoal, our facial bar cleans pores 2x better than a basic cleanser.
DEEP CLEANSING AND OIL REMOVAL - The cleansing technology of Bioré Charcoal cleansers, scrubs, and pore strips are ideal for built-up dirt on oily skin.
DESIGNED FOR DAILY USE - Our charcoal bar is suitable to use up to twice daily, and intended for face and body exfoliation. Reduce use with first signs of irritation.
Infused with natural charcoal and jojoba beads, the charcoal bar draws out impurities and gently exfoliates for smoother skin
The natural peppermint oil leaves your skin feeling tingly fresh
